name: Text.TruncationMode
desc: The type of truncation to apply to a line of text when itâ€™s too long to fit in the available space.

items.name: case head
items.desc: Truncate at the beginning of the line.

items.name: case middle
items.desc: Truncate in the middle of the line.

items.name: case tail
items.desc: Truncate at the end of the line.

items.name: static func == (Text.TruncationMode, Text.TruncationMode) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two truncation modes are equal.

items.name: static func != (Self, Self) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two truncation modes are unequal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the truncation mode by passing them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the truncation mode.
